content: this is a quick and functional little clutch the top closes by sliding the bigger loop through the smaller one so there are no buttons to mess with i love it for when i m wearing pants without pockets i can just slip it on my wrist and run and play with the kids this pattern comes with 2 sizes the small size fits an iphone 5 nicely both with a case and without a case the medium size fits larger phones or i like to put my iphone and keys in it do not redistribute or copy this pattern or photos in any way as with all misty makes patterns you can sell your finished items but please credit me as the designer and add a link back to this listing you can find more of my work at www facebook com/mistymakes1
